Title: Mavs-Grizzlies Live Reactions; Will Dallas Trade Porzingis?
Description: Dalton Trigg and Matt Galatzan talk Mavs/Grizzlies, trade scenarios, and the Kristaps Porzingis conundrum live on the Locker Room app. After sitting at home for eight days due to weather delays, the Dallas Mavericks entered their Monday night matchup with the Memphis Grizzlies hoping to continue their solid play of late,
Author: Sports Illustrated
